Detailed Description

\class CLocationMonitor Encapsulates a location monitor. The location monitor watches a volatile memory location to satisfy some predicate function object. Predicates are objects from classes which implement: bool operator()(T value) T is a templated variable of the class. Such objects are function objects. The Event is fired when the predicate returns TRUE.

Author: Jason Venema NSCL Michigan State University East Lansing, MI 48824-1321 mailto:venemaja@msu.edu
